biotools.summary: Novel computational tool designed to inform compound design by combining structural and activity data. It uses 3D matched molecular pairs to contextualise both activity and inactivity data in its relevant protein environment.

bioschemas.name: OOMMPPAA
bioschemas.summary: Novel computational tool designed to inform compound design by combining structural and activity data. It uses 3D matched molecular pairs to contextualise both activity and inactivity data in its relevant protein environment.
